Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: pgConn
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Pointer to PGconn object that encapsulates a connection to the backend.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: init(info:)
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Makes a new connection to the database server.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: deinit
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: finish()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Closes the connection to the server. Also frees memory used by the PGconn object.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: status()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Status of the connection

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: reset()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Resets the communication channel to the server.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: databaseName
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Database name of the connection.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: userName
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: User name of the connection.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: password
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Password of the connection.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: hostName
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Server host name of the connection.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: port
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Port of the connection.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: commandLineOptions
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Command-line options passed in the connection request.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: transactionStatus()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Returns the current in-transaction status of the server.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: protocolVersion
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Interrogates the frontend/backend protocol being used.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: serverVersion
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Returns an integer representing the server version.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: rawServerVersion
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Returns the server version number.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: errorMessage()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Returns the error message most recently generated by an operation on the connection.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: socket
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Obtains the file descriptor number of the connection socket to the server.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: backendPid
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: The process ID (PID) of the backend process handling this connection.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: connectionNeedsPassword
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: True if the connection authentication method required a password, but none was available

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: sslInUse
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: True if connections uses SSL.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: exec(statement:)
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Submits a command to the server and waits for the result.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: sendQuery(statement:)
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Submits a command to the server without waiting for the result(s).

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: result()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Waits for the next result.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: allResults()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Waits for the next result and returns all result(s).

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: consumeInput()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: If input is available from the server, consume it.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: isBusy()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Returns true if a command is busy.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: nextNotification()
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: notifies() returns the next notification from a list of unhandled

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: eachNotification(_:)
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: rawClientEncoding
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Returns the client encoding.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: clientEncoding
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Returns the client encoding as String.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.name: trace(stream:)
Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Enables tracing of the client/server communication to a debugging file stream.

Classes/PGConnection.html#/s:16postgresq.abstract: Disables tracing started by PQtrace.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Result status of the command

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: statusString
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Readable result status of the command

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: errorMessage
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Error message associated with the command, or nil if there was no error or

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: numberOfRows
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Number of rows (tuples) in the query result.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: numberOfColumns
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Number of columns (fields) in each row of the query result.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: columnName(columnNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the column name associated with the given column number.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: columnNumber(columnName:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the column number associated with the given column name.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: columnOid(columnNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the OID of the table from which the given column was fetched.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: tableColumnNumber(columnNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the column number (within its table) of the column making up the specified query result column.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: formatCode(columnNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the format code indicating the format of the given column.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: dataType(columnNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the data type associated with the given column number.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: typeModifier(columnNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the type modifier of the column associated with the given column number.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: columnSize(columnNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the size in bytes of the column associated with the given column number.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: isNil(rowNumber:columnNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Tests a field for a null value.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: length(rowNumber:columnNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the actual length of a field value in bytes.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: numberOfParameter
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Number of parameters of a prepared statement.

Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.name: dataType(parameterNumber:)
Classes/PGResult.html#/s:16postgresql_sw.abstract: Returns the data type of the indicated statement parameter.
